Configuration.Comment: Configuration contains the user configurable data for a Raphty node

Fields.name: HTTP
Fields.comment: HTTP contains the config for the Raphty HTTPS/JSON API Service

Fields.name: Audit
Fields.comment: Audit contains configuration for the audit logger

Fields.name: Etcd
Fields.comment: Etcd contains Raft service configuration

Fields.name: PKI
Fields.comment: PKI contains Code Signing PKI configuration

Fields.name: CryptoProv
Fields.comment: CryptoProv specifies the configuration for crypto providers

Fields.name: Metrics
Fields.comment: Metrics specifies the metrics pipeline configuration

Fields.name: LogLevels
Fields.comment: LogLevels specifies the log levels per package

Fields.name: Raphty
Fields.comment: Server specifies configurations for the client to connect to the server

Authz.comment: Authz contains configuration for the authorization module

Fields.name: Allow
Fields.comment: Allow will allow the specified roles access to this path and its children, in format: ${path}:${role},${role}

Fields.name: AllowAny
Fields.comment: AllowAny will allow any authenticated request access to this path and its children

Fields.name: AllowAnyRole
Fields.comment: AllowAnyRole will allow any authenticated request that include a non empty role

RepoLogLevel.comment: RepoLogLevel contains information about the log level per repo. Use * to set up global level.

Fields.name: Repo
Fields.comment: Repo specifies the repo name, or '*' for all repos [Global]

Fields.name: Package
Fields.comment: Package specifies the package name

Fields.name: Level
Fields.comment: Level specifies the log level for the repo [ERROR,WARNING,NOTICE,INFO,DEBUG,TRACE].

Logger.comment: Logger contains information about the configuration of a logger/log rotation

Fields.name: Directory
Fields.comment: Directory contains where to store the log files

Fields.name: MaxAgeDays
Fields.comment: MaxAgeDays controls how old files are before deletion

Fields.name: MaxSizeMb
Fields.comment: MaxSizeMb contols how large a single log file can be before its rotated

PrivateCert.Comment: PrivateCert contains configuration info for the signing certificate

Fields.name: ID
Fields.comment: ID specifies the identifier of the certificate to reference

Fields.name: CertFile
Fields.comment: CertFile specifies location of the cert

Fields.name: KeyFile
Fields.comment: KeyFile specifies location of the key

Fields.name: CABundleFile
Fields.comment: CABundleFile specifies location of the CA bundle file

Fields.name: RootBundleFile
Fields.comment: RootBundleFile specifies location of the Trusted Root CA file

PKI.Comment: PKI contains configuration info for code signing PKI

Fields.name: CAConfig
Fields.comment: CAConfig specifies file location with CA profiles

Fields.name: CsrTemplates
Fields.comment: CsrTemplates specifies file location with CSR templates

Fields.name: CRLNextUpdate
Fields.comment: CRLNextUpdate specifies value in 72h00m00s format for duration of CRL next update time

Fields.name: CRLRenewal
Fields.comment: CRLRenewal specifies value in 8h00m00s format for duration of CRL renewal before next update time

Fields.name: CRLUrlTemplate
Fields.comment: CRLUrlTemplate specifies a template for CRL URL. The ${ISSUER_ID} variable will be replaced with a SHA of the issuer.

Fields.name: CodesignCA
Fields.comment: CodesignCA specifies the codesign issuing CA cert

Fields.name: TimestampCA
Fields.comment: TimestampCA specifies the timestamp issuing CA cert

TLSInfo.Comment: TLSInfo contains configuration info for the TLS

Fields.name: CertFile
Fields.comment: Location of the cert

Fields.name: KeyFile
Fields.comment: Location of the key

Fields.name: TrustedCAFile
Fields.comment: Location of the CA file

Fields.name: ClientCertAuth
Fields.comment: Controls client auth

Etcd.Comment: Etcd contains configuration info for the underlying raft cluster

Fields.name: InitialCluster
Fields.comment: InitialCluster specifies a set of peers to use for a new cluster

Fields.name: RevRetention
Fields.comment: RevRetention specifies revision unit for auto compaction

Fields.name: ClusterToken
Fields.comment: ClusterToken specifies a unique token for multiple clusters to distinguish and protect the data

Fields.name: AdvertPeerURLs
Fields.comment: AdvertPeerURLs specifies URLS to advertise peers

Fields.name: PeerURLs
Fields.comment: PeerURLs specifies URLS to listen on peers

Fields.name: AdvertClientURLs
Fields.comment: AdvertClientURLs specifies URLS to advertise clients

Fields.name: ClientURLs
Fields.comment: ClientURLs specifies URLS to listen on clients

Fields.name: Name
Fields.comment: Specifies Raft cluster name

Fields.name: SnapshotDir
Fields.comment: SnapshotDir specifies snapshot directory name

Fields.name: BackupRetention
Fields.comment: BackupRetention specifies the age in days for snapshots backup retention

Fields.name: BackupSchedule
Fields.comment: BackupSchedule specifies a schedule for the data backup task in format documented in /pkg/tasks. If it is empty, the backup task is disabled

Fields.name: DataDir
Fields.comment: DataDir specifies a directory where to store the data files

Fields.name: MaxSnapFiles
Fields.comment: MaxSnapFiles specifies max snapshots to keep

Fields.name: Debug
Fields.comment: Debug specifies debug mode

Fields.name: ClientTLS
Fields.comment: ClientTLS specifies TLS config for client/server

Fields.name: PeerTLS
Fields.comment: PeerTLS specifies TLS config for cluster peers

CryptoProv.Comment: CryptoProv specifies the configuration for crypto providers

Fields.name: Default
Fields.comment: Default specifies the location of the configuration file for default provider

Fields.name: Providers
Fields.comment: Providers specifies the list of locations of the configuration files

Metrics.Comment: Metrics specifies the metrics pipeline configuration

Fields.name: ConfigFile
Fields.comment: ConfigFile specifies the file containing the metrics pipeline config

Fields.name: Datacenter
Fields.comment: Datacenter specifies the Datacenter where the instance is running. This value is used to override the one in the config file.

HTTPServer.Comment: HTTPServer contains the configuration of the HTTPS API Service

Fields.name: ServiceName
Fields.comment: ServiceName specifies name of the service: HTTP|HTTPS|WebAPI

Fields.name: Disabled
Fields.comment: Disabled specifies if the service is disabled

Fields.name: VIPName
Fields.comment: VIPName is the FQ name of the VIP to the Raphty cluster [this is used when building the cert requests]

Fields.name: BindAddr
Fields.comment: BindAddr is the address that the HTTPS service should be exposed on

Fields.name: ServerTLS
Fields.comment: TLS config for server

Fields.name: PackageLogger
Fields.comment: PackageLogger if set, specifies name of the package logger

Fields.name: AllowProfiling
Fields.comment: AllowProfiling if set, will allow for per request CPU/Memory profiling triggered by the URI QueryString

Fields.name: ProfilerDir
Fields.comment: ProfilerDir specifies the directories where per-request profile information is written, if not set will write to a TMP dir

Fields.name: Services
Fields.comment: Services is a list of services to enable for this HTTP Service

Fields.name: Authz
Fields.comment: Authz contains configuration for the API authorization layer

Fields.name: HeartbeatSecs
Fields.comment: HeartbeatSecs specifies heartbeat interval in seconds [30 secs is a minimum]

HTTPClient.Comment: HTTPClient specifies configurations for the client to connect to the server

Fields.name: Servers
Fields.comment: Servers decribes the list of Raphty server URLs to contact

Fields.name: ClientTLS
Fields.comment: ClientTLS describes the TLS certs used to connect to Raphty
